alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns and central Clay Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Cove Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Middleburg, Fruit Cove, Picolata, Switzerland, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
